---
Implement the plan defined in the mentioned implementation plan file.

- Implement the plan step by step following the defined step in the plan files

# Coding guidelines
- Avoid `var` keyword
- Use design patterns if needed
- Use functional programming features when its necessary
- Use clean code tips to improve readability
